This is the client library for communicating with a LiveDB Enterprise Server.
For information on obtaining LiveDB Server see http://bit.ly/N2ttWt

For more information on #liveDB visit: 
http://livedb.devrex.se
http://livedomain.codeplex.com
http://github.org/devrexlabs
http://twitter.com/robertfriberg
http://twitter.com/livedomain
